files.patch:
@@ -1,1 +1,1 @@
-name: Build and Test ApiDiff
+name: Build and Test APIDiff
@@ -17,2 +17,0 @@
-        with:
-          fetch-depth: 1
@@ -21,1 +19,1 @@
-        uses: oracle-actions/setup-java@v1
+        uses: actions/setup-java@v4
@@ -23,2 +21,6 @@
-          website: oracle.com
-          release: 17
+          distribution: 'oracle'
+          java-version: 17
+
+      - name: 'Build APIDiff'
+        shell: bash
+        run: bash make/build.sh
@@ -26,1 +28,1 @@
-      - name: 'Build ApiDiff'
+      - name: 'Self-test APIDiff'
@@ -28,3 +30,1 @@
-        run: |
-          java --version
-          bash make/build.sh
+        run: bash make/build.sh --skip-download -- test
